intro: Survive brutal ambushes, and push through increasingly hostile sectors!
description:
Dive into the depths of a massive underground military facility in Deep Combat, a high-intensity 2D action platformer packed with danger and futuristic warfare. Play as an elite soldier sent far below the surface to eliminate advanced threats, survive brutal ambushes, and push through increasingly hostile sectors.

With fluid combat, tight controls, and a tense sci-fi atmosphere, Deep Combat delivers an intense and immersive action experience from beginning to end.

Features:
- Fast-paced 2D action platforming
- Fluid combat with responsive controls
- Futuristic enemies, traps, and high-tech hazards
- Constant tension with ambushes and dynamic encounters
